subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Seth Griffith and Patrice Bergeron scored first-period goals, Tuukka Rask stopped 33 shots and the host Boston Bruins rebounded from consecutive embarrassing losses with a 2-1 win over the Carolina Hurricanes.
snippet: Seth Griffith and Patrice Bergeron scored first-period goals, Tuukka Rask stopped 33 shots and the host Boston Bruins rebounded from consecutive embarrassing losses with a 2-1 win over the Carolina Hurricanes.
